entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence can we hold @NC_Governor accountable as well? He’s encouraging group screams of 4,000+ and imposing stricter coronavirus guidelines at the same time. The race wars only decimate what coronavirus couldn’t. Wait for the second wave.. watch how they make it DT’s fault #globalist
